original_title: Sri Lanka to bat first against Scotland
original_body_lines: Scotland won the toss and asked Sri Lanka to bat first in their ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifiers match in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe.

Sri Lanka XI: 1 Dimuth Karunaratne, 2 Pathum Nissanka, 3 Kusal Mendis (wk), 4 Sadeera Samawickrama, 5 Charith Asalanka, 6 Dhananjaya de Silva, 7 Dasun Shanaka (capt.), 8 Wanindu Hasaranga, 9 Maheesh Theekshana, 10 Kasun Rajitha, 11 Lahiru Kumara.

Scotland XI: 1 Matthew Cross (wk), 2 Chris McBride, 3 Brandon McMullen, 4 Richie Berrington (capt.), 5 Tomas Mackintosh, 6 Michael Leask, 7 Jack Jarvis, 8 Chris Greaves, 9 Mark Watt, 10 Chris Sole, 11 Alasdair Evans.
